CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, "Minggu", 1, "Senin", 2, "Selasa", 3, "Rabu", 4, "Kamis", 5, "Jumat", 6, "Sabtu", "" ) & ", " & TEXT(DAY(TODAY())) & " " & CASE(MONTH(TODAY()), 1, "Januari", 2, "Februari", 3, "Maret", 4, "April", 5, "Mei", 6, "Juni", 7, "Juli", 8, "Agustus", 9, "September", 10, "Oktober", 11, "November", 12, "Desember", "" ) & " " & TEXT(YEAR(TODAY()))
CustomField.label: Today Date
